title: server lag
body: I was in champ select when I slightly lagged for about 2-3 seconds, and one of my teammates was kinda raging about how ppl kept dodging. So I decided to play a prank on him and wait till the last second to select. At second 3, It said team has been disbanded for a dodge, when I had 3 seconds left. which means that, yes partly my internets fault, but also riots fault because riots server didn't recover the last 3 seconds. >.>

replies.body: Sounds like the prank didn't work out so well.  :(  When you join champion select, the server has to grab everyone and group them in together.  If you have any network issues or even a weak wifi connection, you can actually get ouf ot sync at champion select or get left behind entirely.  I highly suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is in tip-top shape to avoid issues like this in the future.  Let me know if you have any questions!
